Header.Original: CVE-2015-XXXX [BUG/MAJOR: http: prevent risk of reading past end with balance url_param]
Header.Description: [BUG/MAJOR: http: prevent risk of reading past end with balance url_param]

Annotations.Original: NOTE: For squeeze, the above commit message implies that the fix does not need to be backported to version 1.4 and indeed, the code already contains a (different) check that limits the value of "len".
